citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the facility representative was unable to locate the disposition records for the rabbits, guinea
pigs and pot belly pigs sold during the Fall Festival held in October 2022. The facility representative then attempted to
contact the licensee by phone and after a short wait the licensee returned her call. I was then able to speak with the
licensee and when asked about the location of the disposition records the licensee stated that she threw them out and no
longer had them because they did not contain the right information. The licensee thought she may have pictures of the
records on her phone but was also unable to locate and provide them. Throwing records away and not maintaining them
doesn’t allow APHIS officials to review the records and properly track the animals. Exhibitors are required to make, keep,
and maintain records that disclose all required information for the animals under their control. Correct from this date
forward.
This inspection was conducted with the facility representative and the exit interview was conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At the time of inspection, the facility representative was unable to locate the disposition records for the rabbits, guinea 
pigs and pot belly pigs sold during the Fall Festival held in October 2022.  The facility representative then attempted to 
contact the licensee by phone and after a short wait the licensee returned her call.  I was then able to speak with the 
licensee and when asked about the location of  the disposition records the licensee stated that she threw them out and no 
longer had them because they did not contain the right information.  The licensee thought she may have pictures of the 
records on her phone but was also unable to locate and provide them.  Throwing records away and not maintaining them 
doesn’t allow APHIS officials to review the records and properly track the animals.  Exhibitors are required to make, keep, 
and maintain records that disclose all required information for the animals under their control.  Correct from this date 
forward. 
 
This inspection was conducted with the facility representative and the exit interview was conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
